fields.value: Census of Population and Housing, 1980 [United States]:  Congressional District Equivalency File (99th Congress)

authorName.value: United States Department of Commerce. Bureau of the Census

authorAffiliation.value: United States Department of Commerce. Bureau of the Census

dsDescriptionValue.value:
Congressional districts of the 99th Congress are matched to   census geographic areas in this file. The areas used are those from the   1980 census. Each record contains geographic data, a congressional   district code, and the total 1980 population count. Ten states were   redistricted for the 99th Congress: California, Hawaii, Louisiana,   Maine,
Mississippi, Montana, New Jersey, New York, Texas, and   Washington. The data for the other 40 states and the District of  Columbia are identical to that for the 98th Congress.

topicClassValue.value: ICPSR I.A.1.c. Census Enumerations: Historical and Contemporary Population Characteristics, United States, Decennial Censuses, 1980 Census
